description:
This course is an introduction to nParticles in Maya , and its a project based approach , so instead of listening me talking about tools and button , you will learn how to make fire and smoke emitting from the rocket when it take off , you will learn how to use another technique for creating fire in the fireplace and how to use instancing to copy any object to any particle system you have .

At the end of this course you will have solid knowledge of using FX nParticles in Maya.

  • There are a lot of 3D Artists , character animators and lighting Artists..... , but there are few FX artists , and that's why I created this course . to teach you FX.
  • At the end of this course you will have solid knowledge of using FX nParticles in Maya.
  • You can show what you have done to any commercial studio in world proudly , and they will appreciate what you are able to do , cause they know that few artists can do what you did ! .
  • You will learn making effects that you can not learn it anywhere .
  • FAQ :
    • Will you update this course in the future by adding more lectures ?
      • Yes , I will add more 3 video lectures and a lot of presentations and tips and tricks.
    • Will you give us more homework when you add more lectures in the future ?
      • Yes .
    • Which software is best for creating Particles and simulations ?
      • Autodesk Maya is the most powerful software at this time .
    • What is FX Artist ?
      • FX Artist responsible for creating any kind of particle simulations , like fire , smoke , water, shattering ,cloth and hair simulations.
title: Introduction to nParticles in Maya 2016
